turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two small pizzas and they both need to be with a gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one to be buffalo chicken and I want one with tomatoes, bacon and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, 2 small gluten free crust pizzas, 1 buffalo chicken, 1 with tomatoes, bacon, and onions, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I add extra sauce to the second one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can add that to your order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $28, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, that works for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: picking up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, I will.
